title: Reported Person no longer being removed from my game pool
body: I was under the impression reported people were removed from your possible team pool. I've had a player in 3 games straight tonight who has harassed other players all game and intentionally fed. He received multiple reports on each game and yet everyone in there continues to see him. Is this a bug or are reported players going back into our possible team pools in queue?

replies.body:
*Zombiemaster* is correct, there's no feature in the game that prevents a player from being matched with or against you. You can always mute a player to avoid seeing their chat, or you add them to your block list if they're really bugging you. 

You can find out exactly what a report does in [this FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player) Let me know if you have any questions.

> I was under the impression reported people were removed from your possible team pool. 

Sorry to tell you, but that's not true. Reporting someone does not remove the possibility of having them on your team. Currently, there is nothing in place for us to do this.
